channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple iPhone 18 Could See Major Change To Free Satellite Features, Report Says
item.description: For the last few years, iPhones have had satellite connectivity with Globalstar. That may be about to change out of recognition.

item.title: Mortgages As Employee Benefits And What Is The Next Frontier In Corporate Talent Strategy
item.description: As Fed rate cuts loom and affordability hits crisis levels, a Kleiner Perkins-backed startup is transforming how companies compete for talent

item.title: Nokia Vaults Higher On Proof of Growth In AI Infrastructure

item.title: The future
